page.title: 12HOTEL&RESTAURANT,CARSPHAIRN
page.content: {SALUTATION HOTEL There is one hotel in the village.It is very popular with the locals for a quiet drink at the end of a working day.As well as the bar the hotel provides bed and breakfast, bar lunches and evening meals. {GREYSTONES RESTAURANT Opened six years ago as a Tea Room and Craft Shop, it has now developed into a licensed restaurant, whose customers are drawn from a wide area.The menu has a limited choice, but all meals are of a high standard and well prepared. If advance notice is given, special dishes will be provided on request.
